summary: A command‑line utility that runs a short training benchmark for a Hugging Face sequence‑classification model using the Accelerate library. It loads a dataset, tokenizes it, builds data loaders, sets up an optimizer and learning‑rate scheduler, executes a training loop under the selected distributed strategy (e.g., DeepSpeed, FSDP), measures throughput and timing, and writes the performance metrics to a JSON file.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to quickly assess the training speed and scaling behavior of models on different hardware and accelerator configurations, facilitating performance comparison and hardware selection decisions.
